item.description: The Mayan calendar has given us plenty of fodder and conjecture for a planetary shift that is expected to happen near the end of this year. Whether or not you believe there is anything to the 2012 myth/hype, it does appear we are in the midst of some spectacular systemic changes (e.g. economic austerity, unstable food & energy prices, social unrest, global climate change, geo-political upheaval, technological paradigm shifts, cultural values clashes, etc.).  Tonight we will engage in a being experiment. We will assume that there is a major cataclysmic shift coming, and use the Integral model to see how we can best prepare ourselves for it.  Will you downshift to survival mode?  Will you take a heroic stance for something greater than yourself? Or will you just bear witness to it all? These are not easy questions to answer conceptually, however, embodying these possible modalities will better prepare us for this chaotic emergence whether or not it happens this year or in the distant future.
item.name: Are You Prepared for December 21, 2012?
